Class Originator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Originator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Originator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The Originator class has the current state of the game and can save the state.
